name: Foreign Correspondent Earrings - Vintage Glass and Sterling
description:
Vintage Glass and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

Wear a romantic narrative. Vintage glass frames in palest blue swing from lengths of oxidized sterling silver krinkle chain, in tandem with opalescent vintage glass leaves. Topped with a brilliantly glittering cut glass vintage black bead, and finished with oxidized sterling silver French hooks.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Skating in Central Park Earrings - Vintage Glass and Sterling
description:
Vintage Glass and Bright Sterling Silver Earrings.

Delicate winter colors and crackling texture. Vintage grey glass textured rounds anchor pearly, highly detailed vintage glass leaves. Hung from bright sterling silver circle chain, and finished with bright sterling silver French hooks.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Alpine Earrings - Vintage Glass and Sterling Silver
description:
Vintage Glass and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

Wintry landscape. Very rare vintage blue glass sugar beads top white vintage glass vertebrae. Accented with a tiny vintage blue flower with red rhinestone center. Hung from oxidized sterling silver long kidney hooks. Earrings hang about 2 3/4" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle.

name: Cactus Earrings - One of a kind - Vintage Glass and Sterling Silver
description:
Vintage Glass and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

~This item is one of a kind.~

Is it warm in here? I feel warm. Stunning machine-cut vintage ruby glass pendants nestle inside oxidized sterling silver tube beads, studded with balls of bright sterling silver. Hung from oxidized sterling silver circle chain, and finished with oxidized sterling silver French hooks.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Urban Druid Earrings - Vintage Glass, Steel Hardware and Sterling
description:
Vintage Glass, Steel Hardware and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

A study in shapeshifting. Vintage glass petals/feathers/leaves set with flecks of gold dangle inside carbon steel retaining rings. Topped with an iridescent olive green vintage glass bead and suspended from a length of oxidized sterling silver circle chain. Finished with oxidized sterling silver French hooks. Earrings hang about 3 1/4" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Urban Druid Necklace - Vintage Bone, Vintage Wood, Vintage Glass
description:
Vintage Bone, Vintage Wood, Vintage Glass, Steel Hardware and Oxidized Sterling Silver Necklace.

The urban druid keeps her talismans close. Wood and bone, silver and runes. Vintage beads are suspended in and from a carbon steel retaining ring, hung from 18" of oxidized sterling silver chain. Finished with an oxidized sterling silver French hook. Pendant is about 2 1/2" long.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Ghostly Earrings - Vintage Glass, Steel Hardware and Sterling Silver
description:
Vintage Glass, Steel Hardware and Bright Sterling Silver Earrings.

Ephemera wrapped in carbon steel. Lovely vintage glass roses once upon a time had a pearly coating, but they are so old that it's flaked off and left a haunting milky white flower beneath. Suspended inside off-kilter steel retaining rings, and hung from a chain of glittering vintage glass drops. Finished with bright sterling silver French hooks. Earrings hang about 3" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Drama Queen Earrings - One of a Kind - Vintage Glass and Sterling
description:
Vintage Glass, Vintage Rhinestone Ball and Bright Sterling Silver Earrings.

~This item is one of a kind.~

Giant. Not to say blinding. They're kind of a big deal. Vintage rhinestone balls repurposed from a pair of earrings are topped with huge faceted vintage glass beads in deep garnet red. Finished with bright sterling silver long kidney hooks. Earrings hang a little over 2" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Dirty Mermaid Earrings - Vintage Brass, Glass, Chain and Sterling Silver
description:
Vintage Verdigris Brass, Vintage Glass, Vintage Chain and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

All she wanted was to shake the ocean off her tail and get her feet dirty. The ultimate in grit & sparkle: a vintage brass teardrop with a verdigris patina anchors a glittering clear cut glass vintage bead, and a comet tail of fluttery vintage brass chain. Finished with oxidized sterling silver French hooks. Earrings hang about 3 1/4" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle. 

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: RESERVED - Legendary Bracelet - One of a Kind - Vintage Glass and Sterling Silver
description:
Vintage Glass and Oxidized Sterling Silver Bracelet.

Vintage Glass and Oxidized Sterling Silver Bracelet.

~This item is one of a kind.~

This bracelet is true romance for the daring soul. Juicy crystals of hyacinth orange vintage glass cluster at the end of a double length of oxidized sterling silver chain, punctuated by a vintage grey glass rose. Finished with an oxidized sterling silver lobster clasp. Bracelet is adjustable to fit wrists up to 7" around with a slight drape over the hand.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Stage Door Earrings V - Silk Scrap & Vintage Beads
description:
Vintage Cotton Pearl, Vintage Brass, Silk Scrap and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

Rustle & float. Warm gold silk scraps shot with purple are bustled beneath vintage brass bead caps, and topped with a vintage cotton pearl. Suspended from a length of vintage brass chain and finished with oxidized sterling silver French hooks. Light and full of movement. Earrings hang about 3" long from top of hook to bottom of silk.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Maid Marian Earrings - Vintage Glass, Vintage Bone and Sterling
description:
Vintage Glass, Contemporary Glass, Vintage Bone and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

Whimsical woodland danglers with a bullseye touch. Vintage and contemporary glass beads are wired together in a stack, and the bottom vintage glass pendant is accented with a tiny vintage bone round. Finished with short oxidized sterling silver kidney hooks. Earrings hang about 2 3/4" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Stanwyck Bracelet - Vintage Glass, Brass and Oxidized Sterling Silver
description:
Vintage Glass, Vintage Brass, Vintage Chain and Oxidized Sterling Silver Bracelet.

Every time I see a Barbara Stanwyck movie, I get the urge to make something with brass and crystal. Not, mind you, that I'm calling her a brassy dame; she's one of my favorites. But it's a persistent association of ideas, and I finally got around to doing it. This piecey, graceful bracelet incorporates vintage brass chain, oxidized sterling silver chain, a beautiful vintage brass bead, several elegant and sparkly vintage glass crystals, a vintage glass pearl, and a vintage raw brass flower. Finished with an oxidized sterling silver lobster clasp and an extender chain. Bracelet is adjustable to fit wrists from 6 to 8 inches around.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Nouveau Poire Earrings - Vintage Glass, Brass and Sterling
description:
Vintage Glass, Brass and Bright Sterling Silver Earrings.

I love purple and yellow together, and in this combination I've combined them with shining mixed metals for an extra dose of playfulness. Vintage yellow glass pears with tiny lampworked green leaves hang from a textured bright brass ring, accented with a matte vintage glass bead in fig purple, and a sparkling vintage lavender glass round. Finished with bright sterling silver French hooks. Pear is 3/4" long, brass ring is about 3/4" across, and earrings hang just over 2 1/4" long from top of hook to bottom of pear.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Nightingale Earrings - Vintage Glass and Sterling Silver
description:
Vintage Glass and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

Vintage glass vertebrae beads in glossy white make a double cap for a tiny trailing vine of Art Deco rose beads in matte teal. Finished with oxidized sterling silver French hooks. Earrings hang 2 1/4" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Cacophony Earrings - Vintage Glass, Vintage Metal and Sterling Silver
description:
Vintage Glass, Vintage Hand-Patinaed Brass and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

~ This item is one of a kind. ~

A jungle of color. Ornate vintage brass pieces have been hand colored with a verdigris patina and sealed for durability, then ornamented with vintage glass leaves and flowers in asymmetrical arrangements of blues and oranges. Hung from oxidized sterling silver chain and finished with oxidized sterling silver French hooks. Earrings hang about 3" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Wasabi Earrings - Vintage and Contemporary Glass and Sterling
description:
Vintage Glass, Contemporary Glass and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

I can't resist beads in this glorious chartreuse, particularly if they're leaves. Contemporary green glass leaf pendants dangle beneath a vintage rough-cut glass round in true lipstick red. Finished with oxidized sterling silver long kidney hooks. Earrings hang about 2 3/4" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Ring in the New Earrings - Vintage Glass, Mother of Pearl and Sterling Silver
description:
Vintage Glass, Carved Mother of Pearl and Bright Sterling Silver Earrings.

Sparkling, festive earrings in wintry blue and white. Vintage glass bell beads in aqua blue dangle beneath carved mother of pearl links, accented with a vintage glass faceted round with silvery finish. Finished with bright sterling silver French hooks. Earrings hang about 2 1/4" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Giggle Earrings - Vintage Glass and Oxidized Sterling Silver
description:
Vintage Glass and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

Well, that's just delightful. Rare vintage glass pendants in wiggly, bumpy orange dangle below vintage matte glass orange millefiori rounds. Finished with oxidized sterling silver French hooks. Lightweight and fluttery and full of joy. Earrings hang about 2 1/2" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Footpath Bracelet - Vintage and Contemporary Glass, Sterling Silver
description:
Vintage Glass, Contemporary Glass and Oxidized Sterling Silver Bracelet.

Simple, but beautifully compelling. Follow the path of vintage glass ivory pearls to a sprinkling of contemporary glass leaves in matte and polished wasabi green. Finished with oxidized sterling silver extender chain and lobster clasp. Adjustable to fit wrists up to 7" around with a slight drape over the hand.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Green Fairy Earrings - Vintage and Contemporary Glass, Sterling Silver
description:
Vintage Glass, Contemporary Glass and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

Romantic and maybe just a little bit dangerous. Contemporary glass leaves in brilliant matte wasabi green dangle from lengths of oxidized sterling silver chain, accented with a vintage black glass flower, and a vintage black glass faceted bead. Finished with oxidized sterling silver French hooks.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Urban Druid Bracelet - Vintage Bone, Vintage Glass, Brass & Steel Hardware
description:
Vintage Bone, Vintage Glass, Vintage Chain, Brass and Steel Hardware Bracelet.

~ This bracelet is one of a kind. ~

She takes her power from sources both traditional and unexpected, drawing on the grit and magic of the city around her. Elements of bone, bell, feather and crescent are all incorporated into this gorgeous bracelet. The crescent centerpiece is a steel retaining ring, flanked on one side by vintage carved bone and glass beads, and on the other by a length of vintage brass chain and a section of linked vintage brass beads in shimmering olive green. A brass flower accent functions as a chiming bell, with the addition of a tiny vintage glass bead. Finished with a brass lobster clasp, a length of vintage brass chain, and a vintage glass feather bead in white with faded gold accents. Adjustable to fit wrists up to 7" around with a slight drape.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Fin de Siecle Bracelet - Vintage Glass and Sterling Silver
description:
Vintage Glass and Oxidized Sterling Silver Bracelet.

Faded glory with an industrial edge. Vintage glass sugar beads in pale, pearly pink alternate with gorgeously sparkly gold rough-cut vintage glass beads. Two pink copper rings add a beautiful visual twist. Finished with an oxidized sterling silver clasp, sterling extender chain, and a tiny vintage glass polka dot bead in bronze and black. Bracelet is adjustable to fit wrists up to 7" around with a slight drape over the hand.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Cherry Darling Earrings
description:
Vintage Glass and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

"It's go-go, not cry-cry." Up your saucy quotient with these stunningly girly sparklers. Tiny burgundy vintage glass pearls top crazy shiny vintage crystals in pale pink, above a vintage pendant in clear crystal cut glass. Finished with oxidized sterling silver French hooks. Earrings hang about 2 1/2" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle.

name: Demure Earrings - Vintage Glass, Vintage Brass and Sterling
description:
Vintage Glass, Vintage Brass and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

In a gesture of delicate intimacy, he unbuttoned the top of her glove and kissed the inside of her wrist. Vintage cut glass beads in glittering aqua nestle inside leafy vintage brass caps. A vintage brass glove charm hangs below. Hung from oxidized sterling silver chain and finished with oxidized sterling silver French hooks. Earrings hang about 2 3/4" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Holy/Shadow Earrings: I
description:
Vintage Glass and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

Angels on your shoulders. Long, glittering asymmetrical earrings in opposing forces of light and dark. Holy progresses from white through yellow, ending in a teardrop of gold leaf wrapped in limpid glass. Shadow moves from pale, glowing lavender through purple to  black, ending in a wickedly barbed antique French jet glass pendant.

Earrings hang 4 1/4" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle.

name: Folie a Deux Bracelet
description:
Vintage Glass and Bright Sterling Silver Bracelet.

A bright and pretty floral bracelet to help you imagine your winter-weariness away. Bloom-bright green and yellow vintage glass beads are arranged in an asymmetrical pattern and securely wired together with bright sterling silver. Finished with a bright sterling silver lobster clasp and extender chain. Yellow beads average 1/3" across, and green speckled beads are 1/2" long. Bracelet is adjustable to fit wrists up to 8" around with a slight drape over the hand.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Revolution Earrings
description:
Vintage Copper, Vintage Glass Pearl and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

This subtly feminine industrial design was inspired by the light fixtures at Revolution Brewery in Chicago (which are made of barrel staves curved into a ball around a lightbulb). Vintage copper cages house gleaming ivory vintage glass pearls, suspended from a length of oxidized sterling silver circle chain. Finished with oxidized sterling silver French hooks. Earrings hang about 2 3/4" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Morthal at Night Earrings - Vintage Glass and Sterling
description:
Vintage Glass and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

Midnight intrigue. Classically lovely sparklers in vintage midnight blue and glass pearl, with a belt of vintage rhinestones for stars. Hung from a length of oxidized sterling silver circle chain, and finished with oxidized sterling silver French hooks. Earrings hang about 2 1/4" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Morthal at Night Bracelet - Vintage and Recycled Glass and Antiqued Brass
description:
Vintage Glass, Recycled Glass, Vintage Metal and Antiqued Brass Bracelet.

Deep night blues and a hint of milky moonlit sky. Vintage glass beads in Montana blue and cloudy white are paired with chippy, sparkling recycled blue glass beads and a vintage enameled metal centerpiece. Finished with vintage antiqued brass chain and an antiqued brass lobster clasp. Bracelet is adjustable to fit wrists up to 7" around with a slight drape over the hand.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Nightbird Earrings - Vintage Glass, Brass and Sterling
description:
Vintage Glass, Vintage Brass, Colored Chain and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

Long, fluttering, earrings with graceful, complex lines. Vintage brass petals are stacked in a loosely swinging arrangement, and anchor a length of hand-patinaed dark purple chain, ending in a glittering vintage glass bead with a hematite finish. Hung from long, gracefully curving hooks. Earrings hang about 3 1/4" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Grimoire Earrings - Vintage Glass and Sterling
description:
Vintage Glass and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

A little leaf from a book of magic. Vintage glass beads in faceted matte black anchor pretty vintage glass blossoms in teal blue and a handful of oxidized sterling silver chains. Finished with oxidized sterling silver French hooks. Earrings hang about 2 3/4" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

categories.name: Blood & Bone: Inspired by Fairy Tales

name: Kobayashi Maru Bracelet - Vintage Glass, Brass, Steel and Sterling
description:
Vintage Glass, Brass, Steel Hardware and Oxidized Sterling Silver Bracelet.

For those days with unsolvable problems, the ultimate in personal armoring adornment. The center piece of this bracelet is based on classic tavern puzzles, and features two steel retaining rings, and three brass chain links, arranged without wiring or soldering, but in such a way that they cannot be undone without breaking the bracelet. The centerpiece is flanked by vintage glass beads in matte mustard yellow and pearly teal blue. Finished with an oxidized sterling silver toggle clasp. Will fit wrists up to 6.5" around with a slight drape over the hand.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Huntress Earrings - Vintage Glass and Bone Earrings
description:
Vintage Swarovski Crystal, Vintage Hand-carved Bone and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

Asymmetrical allure with mesmerizing sparkle. Vintage Swarovski crystals in glittering lavender anchor two halves of a hand-carved vintage bone hook clasp. Hung from a length of oxidized sterling silver chain, and finished with oxidized sterling silver French hooks. Longest earring hangs about 2 3/4" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

categories.name: Blood & Bone: Inspired by Fairy Tales

name: Ring of Kerry Bracelet
description:
Vintage Glass and Oxidized Sterling Silver Bracelet.

This bracelet is true romance for the traveler's soul, evoking green, green hills and craggy rock. Rich nuggets of emerald green vintage glass cluster at the end of a double length of oxidized sterling silver chain, ending in a vintage grey glass rose. Finished with an oxidized sterling silver toggle clasp. Green beads are 1/2" long, rose is about 5/8" long and bracelet is 7 1/2" long.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Maker Earrings - Vintage Glass, Hardware and Sterling
description:
Vintage Glass, Steel Hardware and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

I love working with the contrast between delicate and steely. I think these earrings are a perfect marriage of those complementary forces. Steel hardware pieces are suspended from oxidized sterling silver chain and given an asymmetrical accent with a vintage glass flower in brightest emerald green and a matching tiny vintage glass crystal. Finished with oxidized sterling silver French hooks. Earrings hang about 3" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Grauman's Chinese Theatre Earrings - Vintage Glass and Sterling Silver
description:
Vintage Glass and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

Delicate, sparkling earrings with an Art Deco flavor and plenty of gritty glamour. Vintage pale pink cut glass beads shimmer above a vintage clear glass column, accented with a rhinestone collar. Finished with oxidized sterling silver long kidney hooks to give them extra sway. Earrings hang 2 7/8" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Terraforming Bracelet - One of a Kind - Vintage Glass and Brass
description:
Vintage Glass, Vintage Brass Chain and Antiqued Brass Bracelet.

~ This item is one of a kind. ~

Earth, air, water, life. Rare and wondrous strange vintage glass beads come together in an asymmetrical arrangement to suggest the formation of new worlds. Speckled and textured beads in yellow, brown, orange, green and aqua are securely linked with antiqued brass wire and finished with a length of vintage brass chain and an antiqued brass oversized lobster clasp. Adjustable to fit wrists up to 7" around with a slight drape over the hand.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Naiad Earrings - Vintage Glass, Vintage Crystal and Sterling Silver
description:
Vintage Glass, Vintage Swarovski Crystal and Bright Sterling Silver Earrings.

Watery romance. A vintage Czech glass pendant in creamy ivory dangles below two vintage blue beads - one in dark Montana blue glass, and the other in rare Indian Sapphire Swarovski crystal. Finished with bright sterling silver French hooks. Earrings hang about 2 1/2" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Troth Earrings - Vintage Glass and Sterling Silver
description:
Vintage Glass and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

Dainty, elegant and romantic. Vintage glass pearls in bright white are wired into a marquise shape and accented with a sparkling aqua vintage glass crystal rondelle. Finished with oxidized sterling silver French hooks. Earrings hang 2" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Ghost in the Machine Necklace - One of a Kind - Vintage Glass and Sterling Silver
description:
Vintage Glass and Oxidized Sterling Silver Necklace.

~ This item is one of a kind. ~

Mysterious and elegant. Milky white vintage glass beads alternate with lengths of oxidized sterling silver chain in a variety of styles to create a subtly interesting asymmetrical necklace. Total length of necklace is 29", and slips easily over the head; no clasp.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Heliamphora Earrings - Vintage Glass and Sterling Silver
description:
Vintage Glass, Contemporary Glass and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

Seductive and dangerous, beautiful and deadly. Darkly floral sparklers on long, gritty chain. Vintage glass beads in sparkling hematite grey anchor a bouquet of contemporary glass flowers, vintage glass pearls and a pale green vintage glass bead. Hung from a length of oxidized sterling silver chain, and finished with oxidized sterling silver French hooks. Earrings hang 2 7/8" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Double Indemnity Anklet - Sterling Silver and Vintage Rhinestone Bead
description:
Bright Sterling Silver Chain and Vintage Rhinestone Beadball Anklet.

A delicate and sparkling ornament for your lovely ankle. Narrow bright sterling silver chain with tickling tassels of very fine sterling chain dangling at intervals all around. One tassel is accented with a sparkling vintage rhinestone beadball. Finished with a bright sterling silver lobster clasp. Adjustable for fit; tassels dangle a little over 1" long. When ordering this item, please measure your ankle at the spot where you want the anklet to sit, so that I can size it properly.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Coronet Choker - Vintage Glass, Sterling Silver and Steel
description:
Vintage Glass, Oxidized Sterling Silver and Steel Hardware Necklace.

A glittering, weighty, narrow necklace with just a touch of a hard edge. Vintage glass pearls and hand-cut Art Deco clear glass beads are accented with vintage rhinestone components and a centerpiece of two steel retaining rings flanking a vintage rhinestone ball. Finished with oxidized sterling silver chain and an oxidized sterling silver lobster clasp. This necklace is designed to sit at the base of the throat, and is adjustable to extend to 17 1/2" long at the longest setting. The fifth photograph shows the necklace on a dressform with a 15" neck, and the necklace worn on a medium tight setting.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Totem Bracelet - Vintage Glass, Vintage Bone and Sterling
description:
Vintage Glass, Vintage Hand-carved Bone and Oxidized Sterling Silver Bracelet.

A story of strength and delicacy in complementary halves. Vintage glass beads in sparkling amethyst pair with vintage hand-carved bone beads. Finished with a vintage hand-carved bone hook clasp. This piece is ~almost~ impossible to put on without assistance, but is very secure and will not come undone. As shown, it fits a fairly small wrist - 6" or smaller - but I can make it to fit a larger wrist by request.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

categories.name: Blood & Bone: Inspired by Fairy Tales

name: Libretto Earrings - Vintage Pendants and Sterling
description:
Vintage Glass Pendant and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

Triple threat in sparkling black. Vintage cut glass flower pendants are stacked in a glittering drop from long oxidized sterling silver kidney hooks. Earrings hang about 3" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Fire & Ash - Vintage Glass and Brass Handcuffs
description:
Vintage Glass, Hand-colored Brass Chain and Antiqued Brass Handcuffs.

Sleek and elegant bondage jewelry that can double as a bracelet or necklace. 

Vintage glass pearls in inky charcoal and wine red are paired in an asymmetrical arrangement with vintage glass beads in deep, translucent red. Securely linked with heavy-gauge antiqued brass wire, and connected with a length of handmade fair trade brass chain, to which I've applied a fiery red patina. Finished with matching antiqued brass lobster clasps. For handcuff wear, the clasps should be hooked to the center chain; for bracelet wear, wrap the piece around your wrist several times and connect the clasps to the chain.

This piece is durable for light restraint.

name: Heavenly Bodies Earrings - Vintage Glass and Sterling
description:
Vintage Glass and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

Reach for the stars. Vintage German glass beads in pink feature tiny gold stars. Hung above two glittering vintage glass faceted rounds, and suspended from links of round oxidized sterling silver chain. Finished with oxidized sterling silver French hooks. Earrings hang 3 1/4" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Abacus - Vintage Glass and Brass Bracelet or Necklace
description:
Vintage Glass, Vintage Brass and Oxidized Sterling Silver Jewelry.

I love this piece, but can't decide whether to finish it as a bracelet or a necklace. I've decided to list it just as the focal piece, and will finish it according to the request of the buyer. 

If finished as a bracelet, this piece will be $75; the final price of a necklace will depend on length and materials, but will be somewhere between $80-100.

To purchase, please contact me at leavesofglass@gmail.com

name: Prospects Earrings - Vintage Glass and Oxidized Sterling Silver
description:
Vintage Glass and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

A golden idea. Vintage glass nuggets in matte gold with divots of shiny finish scattered over the surface. Accented with vintage blue speckled beads, and hung from a double length of oxidized sterling silver circle chain. Finished with oxidized sterling silver French hooks. Earrings hang 2 1/2" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Grass Roots Earrings - Vintage Glass and Sterling Silver
description:
Vintage Glass and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

Long and simple and summer-perfect earrings. Vintage glass rings in perfect grass green alternate with aqua glass beads accented with gold markings (I'm not certain if the aqua beads are vintage or not - I can't remember where I got them). Finished with oxidized sterling silver round French hooks. Earrings hang 3 1/4" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Dirty Love Earrings - Vintage Chain and Sterling
description:
Vintage Brass Chain and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

Lengths of vintage brass chain with x-and-o links get a gritty wash of verdigris patina, and a coat of sealing to help the color last. Hung from oxidized sterling silver long kidney hooks. Earrings hang about 2 3/4" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Brandy Alexander Earrings - Vintage Beads and Sterling
description:
Vintage Sequin Beads, Vintage Swarovski Crystal and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

Lightweight earrings full of rich glimmer and sway. Vintage sequined beads with a pressed cotton base dangle from oxidized sterling silver circle chain, accented with vintage Swarovski crystals in smoky blue and light brown. Finished with oxidized sterling silver French hooks. Earrings hang 2 3/4" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Mansfield Park Earrings - Vintage Glass and Sterling
description:
Vintage Glass and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

Dignified romance in old world colors. Vintage glass pendants in pierced carnelian glass are topped with a tiny Art Deco matte glass round in muted teal, and accented with a vintage pearly leaf dangling below. Finished with oxidized sterling silver French hooks. Earrings hang approximately 2 1/2" long from top of hook to bottom of leaf.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Co27 Earrings - Vintage Glass and Sterling Silver
description:
Vintage Glass and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

Beautiful, flashing earrings feature vintage glass snowflakes in stunning cobalt blue, and navy blue faceted vintage glass rounds on oxidized sterling silver chain. Finished with oxidized sterling silver French hooks. Earrings hang 2 1/2" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle. 

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: House of the Rising Sun Earrings - Vintage Glass and Sterling
description:
Vintage Glass, Vintage Brass and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

Bordello reds, and a bad hand of cards. Long, glittery, narrative earrings feature vintage glass and crystal beads in sinfully rich reds, over vintage brass pendants shaped like a gloved hand and a die. Go ahead, take a risk. Finished with oxidized sterling silver French hooks. Earrings hang 3 1/2" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle. 

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Silver Lining Earrings - Vintage Swarovski Crystal, Steel and Sterling
description:
Vintage Swarovski Crystal, Steel Hardware and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

A tough exterior with a pulsing heart of delicate fire. Rare and stunning vintage Swarovski crystals are suspended in the center of steel retaining rings, hung from oxidized sterling silver chain. Finished with oxidized sterling silver French hooks.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Party Dress Earrings - Vintage Glass and Sterling
description:
Vintage Glass and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

The perfect accompaniment to your little black dress. Chic and complex danglers with plenty of dance. Vintage glass beads in palest blue, pearl and matte black pair with oxidized sterling silver chain. Finished with oxidized sterling silver French hooks. Earrings hang 3 1/4" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Show Some Restraint - Handcuffs, Vintage Glass and Brass
description:
Vintage Glass, Vintage Brass Chain and Antiqued Brass Handcuffs.

Sleek and elegant boudoir jewelry that can double as a bracelet for day wear. 

Vintage glass pearls in lustrous white are paired with vintage glass beads in grey and purple, in an asymmetrical arrangement. Securely linked with heavy-gauge antiqued brass wire, and connected with a length of vintage brass chain with closed, soldered links. Finished with matching antiqued brass lobster clasps. For handcuff wear, the clasps should be hooked to the center chain; for bracelet wear, wrap the piece around your wrist several times and connect the clasps together.

This piece is durable for light restraint.

name: Changeling Necklace - One of a Kind
description:
Vintage Glass and Brass Necklace.

~ This necklace is one of a kind. ~

An elegant, delicate and versatile piece of jewelry, designed to be worn as a variety of necklace types or as a multi-wrap bracelet. Tiny, sparkling vintage glass beads in ruby red are wired into handmade fair-trade brass chain, and accented with three vintage glass foil-backed flowers in deepest purple. Finished with a handmade fair-trade brass hook clasp. Necklace is 40" long from end to end.

name: Paragon Earrings - Vintage Glass and Sterling
description:
Vintage Glass and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

A soft and elegant color combination, inspired by my favorite teacup. Vintage glass beads in black and gold dangle from a double length of oxidized sterling silver chain, accented with a vintage glass rose in periwinkle blue and a lustrous ivory vintage glass pearl. Finished with oxidized sterling silver French hooks. Earrings hang about 2 3/4" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle.

name: Huntsman Earrings - Vintage Glass, Vintage Brass and Sterling
description:
Vintage Glass, Vintage Brass and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

Lungs and heart. Trophies of jealousy, ordered by a dark-hearted queen. Vintage glass pendants in ruby red with articulated veined detail have been wrapped with oxidized sterling silver wire, hung from oxidized sterling chain, and accented with vintage brass hearts  with a scroll pattern. Finished with oxidized sterling silver French hooks. Earrings hang about 3" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

categories.name: Blood & Bone: Inspired by Fairy Tales

name: Deathless Bracelet - Vintage Glass, Steel and Sterling
description:
Vintage Glass, Steel Hardware and Oxidized Sterling Silver Bracelet.

A bold and complicated statement for your wrist, inspired by the novel Deathless by Catherynne M. Valente. The centerpiece of this bracelet is formed by two large steel retaining rings, linked with vintage ruby red glass triangles. Double strands of vintage glass pearls and roughly faceted vintage black glass beads end in an adjustable toggle clasp in oxidized sterling silver. This is a large bracelet; the centerpiece is about 1 1/2" wide and nearly 3" long. The toggle clasp has two settings, and will fit wrists up to 7" around.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

categories.name: Blood & Bone: Inspired by Fairy Tales

name: Holy/Shadow Earrings: II
description:
Vintage Glass and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

Another interpretation of the colors of moral dichotomy, presented in vintage glass. Vintage pale yellow crystals top an Art Deco-era glass bead in dark purple, above a vintage glass veined leaf in purple. Hung from a short length of oxidized sterling silver chain, and finished with oxidized sterling silver French hooks. Earrings hang about 3" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Stage Door Earrings I - Silk Scrap & Vintage Beads
description:
Vintage Bone, Vintage Brass, Silk Scrap and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

Rustle & float. Brilliant emerald green silk scraps are bustled beneath vintage brass bead caps, and topped with a hand carved vintage bone bead. Suspended from a length of vintage brass chain and finished with oxidized sterling silver French hooks. Feather light and full of movement. Earrings hang about 4" long from top of hook to bottom of silk.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Legacy Toxins Earrings
description:
Vintage Glass, Vintage Brass and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

The name of this piece refers to protected dumping and runoff sites near Oak Ridge, TN where toxins from the Manhattan Project have settled into the earth.

Iridescent greens and dull aged brass. Vintage glass beads in tremendously sparkling greens top dull brass geometric shapes. Finished with oxidized sterling silver long kidney hooks for maximum sway and sparkle. Earrings hang just over 3" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle.

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.

name: Bird of Sorrow Earrings
description:
Vintage Glass, Hand Patinaed Vintage Metal and Oxidized Sterling Silver Earrings.

This design is part of my occasional series inspired by fairy tales. The Bird of Sorrow is a Turkish tale (you can read the full text here: http://www.sacred-texts.com/asia/ftft/ftft21.htm. The trouble begins when the Bird of Sorrow is released from his cage.

Vintage black glass layering disks drop down to a wasabi green blossom, beneath which swings a vintage brass bird cage which I colored with a matte white patina. Finished with oxidized sterling silver French hooks. Earrings hang about 2 3/4" long from top of hook to bottom of dangle. 

These earrings were designed to coordinate with this stunningly beautiful silk and cotton yoyo necklace by cookoorikoo: http://www.etsy.com/listing/121314539/bird-of-sorrow-cotton-and-silk-yoyo?ref=v1_other_2

All items from Leaves of Glass arrive beautifully packaged for gift giving.
